title.rendered: Official Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science Prospectus consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science based on the information provided within it.

Note: Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science Prospectus 2024

The Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.wsu.ac.za/.

Walter Sisulu University of Technology and Science PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

 

See also Official Nelson Mandela University Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
